datasource.intro1: Upload files: clipboard / CSV / Excel / JSON / Parquet / remote files, auto create tables for analysis (default max 50GB, configurable).
datasource.intro2: Connect remote DB: MySQL / PostgreSQL, then query and load into local tables.
datasource.cardLocalDesc: Upload CSV, Excel, Parquet, JSON and auto pick best upload mode
datasource.aliasPlaceholder: e.g. my_data (leave blank to use filename)
datasource.chunkTooltipLarge: Files >50MB are recommended to use chunked upload
datasource.chunkTooltipSmall: Files <50MB are recommended to use standard upload
datasource.localTipsStd: Standard: for small files (<50MB), faster upload
datasource.localTipsChunk: Chunked: for large files, resumable, more reliable
datasource.cardRemoteDesc: Read common file formats from public URL or GitHub
datasource.remoteUrlHelper: Supported: direct links, GitHub file links (auto convert); CSV/Excel/Parquet/JSON
datasource.remoteTips1: Supports public URLs; auto handles GitHub file links
datasource.remoteTips2: Imported file will become a DuckDB table
datasource.cardServerDesc: Read CSV / Excel / Parquet / JSON from mounted directories
datasource.serverMountAlert: Please mount directories via docker-compose/K8s and update server_data_mounts, then restart. Only allowed paths are visible.
datasource.serverNoMount: No mounts detected. Add entries to server_data_mounts and restart.
datasource.serverNoFiles: No importable files in this directory
datasource.serverAliasHelper: Will create this table name in DuckDB
datasource.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds {{size}}, please use chunked upload.
datasource.urlReadSuccess: File read from URL, table created: {{table}}
datasource.unsupportedType: Unsupported file type, please choose CSV/Excel/Parquet/JSON

paste.title: Paste data import
paste.subtitle: Supports CSV, TSV and similar data; auto-detect delimiter and data types
paste.placeholder:
Paste your data here...

Formats:
• CSV: 1,John,Tech,8000,2023-01-15
• TSV: 1	John	Tech	8000	2023-01-15
• Quoted: "1","John","Tech","8000","2023-01-15"

The system will auto-detect delimiter and data types
paste.tableNameHelper: Use a meaningful name to make queries easier later
paste.previewSubtitle: Confirm columns before saving to DuckDB
paste.unifyAsStringDesc: Set all columns to text to avoid type mismatch when joining

error.noConsistent: No rows with consistent column count found

save.needParse: Please parse data and set table name first

connection.title: Add database connection
connection.name: Connection name
connection.schemaHelper: Schema name in the database (e.g., public). If unable to fetch tables, try 'public'

list.title: Saved connections
list.subtitle: DB connections ({{count}})
list.deleteConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this DB connection?

unifiedquery.intro1: Visual query: Excel-like filter/sort without SQL, pick fields/conditions to get results.
unifiedquery.intro2: SQL editor: query uploaded tables or external DB loaded into DuckDB, full DuckDB SQL supported.
unifiedquery.intro3: Cross-data join: VLOOKUP-style horizontal merge by common keys (order ID, user ID).
unifiedquery.intro4: Cross-data stack: append similar tables (e.g., monthly sales) vertically, even with differing columns.
unifiedquery.intro5: Preview & export: up to 10k rows preview, async tasks for larger outputs, export CSV/Parquet.

table.intro1: Data management: manage DuckDB internal tables and external DB tables.
table.intro2: Table ops: view schema, copy table name, delete unused tables.
table.intro3: Grouping: async result tables, regular tables, temp tables grouped clearly.

async.intro1: Run in background: long-running async queries execute off the main thread.
async.intro2: Result handling: progress updates; export CSV/Parquet or save as new table.
